text: The Alexander Dennis Enviro400EV is a battery electric double-decker bus. It has been made from 2018 to the present day by Alexander Dennis and Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Auto. The Enviro400EV is made as a full-size bus and as a body of a bus that can be built on the BYD K series chassis. == First generation (2018-2024) == From 2018 to 2024, Alexander Dennis and Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Auto made a battery electric bus called the Enviro400EV. === Enviro400EV City === From 2018 to 2024, Alexander Dennis and BYD Auto made a body of a bus called the Enviro400EV City. It can be built on the BYD D8UR chassis. === Enviro400FCEV City === From 2021 to 2024, Alexander Dennis made a fuel cell battery electric bus called the Enviro400FCEV. == Second generation (2023-present) == From 2023 to the present day, Alexander Dennis and Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD Auto make a battery electric bus called the Enviro400EV. == References == == Other websites == * Enviro400EV product descriptions * Enviro400FCEV product descriptions Enviro400EV Category:Double-decker buses Category:Low-floor buses Category:Battery electric buses
title: Alexander Dennis Enviro400EV
